org.buildmlearn.practicehandwriting.helper

Class Animator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.buildmlearn.practicehandwriting.helper.Animator

  • public class Animator
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to provide animations

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long DEFAULT_DURATION
      The default duration of the animation that shall be used if nothing is specified
